jobs.title: Program Manager (SaaS Marketplace)
jobs.description:
About Crozdesk:

Crozdesk.com runs software marketplaces and comparison sites helping businesses globally decide on which software solutions to use. From CRM to Accounting and Marketing Automation to Supply Chain Management - we cover 250+ categories of business software and compare almost everything for our users! Our vendor solutions portal helps thousands of software companies connect with their ideal customers.

We have a dynamic team that's distributed globally with our head office (4 - 5 people) based in Shoreditch, London - which is where you will be located.

If you like a collaborative and productive environment in which responsibilities are shared and where you'll come in contact with all aspects of the business, you'll fit right in.

 
The role:

We are looking for an entrepreneurial self-starter, with a hands-on attitude and a knack for details. You will work on a new program that we are currently piloting that helps software buyers find the information they need through dynamically generated recommendation reports and seamless vendor introductions. You will work with partners, software vendors, users and technical colleagues to refine, test, tweak and scale this digital matchmaking machine. You will run campaigns to promote the program, build new partnerships and develop your own ideas to scale the new program through our marketplaces and wider partner network.

The role sits at the intersection between marketing, sales, product management, customer success and program strategy. Since you will be the point person on this, the program’s success is your success. You will get the chance to earn a bonus and get stock options in line with the program performance. If you are a versatile individual who’s up for a challenge, this role is right for you.

Requirements:

- 1.5+ years of marketing, operations or sales experience in B2B tech and/or startups
- A Bachelor's degree or above with a demonstrable interest in business, technology, statistics or analytics
- A keen understanding of the SaaS / software market and marketplaces in general
- Experience working with CRMs, planning and implementing sales and marketing strategies and dealing with B2B clients
- Experience working with large datasets (Excel, Google Sheets, etc)
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- The ability to foster and grow client relationships
- An entrepreneurial mindset and good technical acumen
 
We offer competitive salaries, a direct and uncapped bonus structure based on the program performance, attractive stock options and pension benefits - all of which will scale with the impact you have on our business. Your base salary will depend on your level of experience and overall skillset.


Base: £25K – £35K   Bonus: based on program performance

Stock Options: based experience and probation performance

Join us at Crozdesk and become part of our fast-paced, close-knit team in a flexible role with plenty of responsibilities and room for growth!

jobs.title: Operations Intern (B2B Software / SaaS)
jobs.description:
For immediate start - October 2019

Crozdesk.com runs software marketplaces and comparison sites helping businesses globally decide on which software solutions to use. From CRM to Accounting and Marketing Automation to Supply Chain Management - we cover 250+ categories of business software and compare almost everything for our users! Our vendor solutions portal helps thousands of software companies connect with their ideal customers.
We have a dynamic team that's distributed globally with our head office (4 - 5 people) based in Shoreditch, London - which is where you will be located.
If you like a collaborative and productive environment in which responsibilities are shared and where you'll come in contact with all aspects of the business, you'll fit right in.

THE ROLE

We are looking for a graduate or student, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a hands-on attitude and a knack for details, to join us for a 3+ months internship. You’ll be part of a small startup team, working on data-driven marketing and operations projects, across several products and business functions. You will get the chance to work with partners, software vendors, users and colleagues, to refine, test and tweak internal marketing and ops initiatives. This will involve handling large amounts of data, working on data-driven search engine optimisation (SEO) projects and many online systems (e.g. CRMs, analytics programs, etc.) - so, technical acumen and analytical thinking are key.
The internship is best suited for well-rounded candidates who don’t mind a challenge, are looking to learn and be part of an environment where responsibilities are shared regardless of the job title.

REQUIREMENTS

- Previous work experience B2B tech, startups or demonstrable interest in all things tech
- A Bachelor's degree or above (in progress or completed), ideally focussed on business administration or scientific subjects
- An understanding of SaaS / business software and marketplaces in general
- Experience working with large datasets (Excel, Google Sheets, etc)
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- The ability to foster and grow client relationships
- An entrepreneurial mindset and good technical acumen
 
Internship Salary: £1450 per month
 
Join us at Crozdesk and become part of our fast-paced, close-knit team in a flexible role with plenty of responsibilities and room for growth!

jobs.title: Software Advisor
jobs.description:
About Crozdesk.com

Crozdesk.com runs software marketplaces and comparison sites helping businesses globally decide on which software solutions to use. From CRM to Project Management - we cover 250+ categories of business software and compare almost everything for our users! Our vendor solutions portal helps thousands of software companies connect with their ideal customers.

We have a dynamic team that's distributed globally with a small office based in Shoreditch, London - which is where you will be located.

If you like a collaborative and productive environment in which responsibilities are shared and where you'll come in contact with all aspects of the business, you'll fit right in.

The role

We are looking for a Software Advisor, to give advice to business users on the phone and via email. You will work with software buyers to gather requirements and give them advice on what solutions to use - starting with Project Management software and then moving on to CRM and other software categories. While there is no cold-calling involved, you will need to call back lots of businesses who have requested advice across our software comparison and partnership network to go over their requirements.

We’re looking for a strong phone and email communicator, who can quickly understand prospects’ requirements, cope with technical complexity and adapt to different circumstances. Additionally, you should have a keen understanding of software and technology in general and be highly organised. 

Requirements

- 1+ years of marketing, operations or sales experience in technology and/or startups

- A Bachelor's degree or relevant work experience

- Experience working with online systems, such as CRMs, project management and spreadsheet software

- Experience working with large datasets (through Excel, Google Sheets, etc)

- Excellent written and phone communication skills

- A keen understanding of the SaaS / software market and marketplaces in general

- The ability to foster and grow client relationships

- An entrepreneurial mindset and good technical acumen

We offer competitive salaries, a direct and uncapped bonus structure based on your performance and pension benefits - all of which will scale with the impact you have on our business. Your base salary will depend on your level of experience and overall skillset. If you really prove yourself you will also be able to earn stock options down the line.

Base: £22K – £30K        Bonus: dep. on performance        Stock Options:  dep. on performance

Join us at Crozdesk and become part of our fast-paced, close-knit team in a flexible role with plenty of responsibilities and room for growth!

jobs.title: Software Advisor
jobs.description:
We are looking for passionate software geeks, with a hands-on attitude and a drive for helping people.

ABOUT US
Crozdesk.com runs software marketplaces and comparison sites helping businesses globally decide on which software solutions to use. From CRM to Accounting and Enterprise Project Management Software - we cover 250+ categories of business software and compare almost everything for our users! Our vendor solutions portal helps thousands of software companies connect with their ideal customers.

We have a dynamic team that's centered in our head office (4 - 5 people) in London and are building an office in Amsterdam to expand our reach into the European market - you will be located in Amsterdam.

ROLE
This role is focused on advising people on the best software for their business needs. You will work on a new program that we are currently piloting, helping software buyers find the information they need through dynamically generated recommendation reports and seamless vendor introductions. To achieve that, you will be communicating a lot - making calls and writing emails. While inquiries are generated by the buyer and we don't do cold calling, most of our calls will be outbound. We collect information so our clients can get in touch with the buyer and pick up a relevant conversation with a new prospect. 

REQUIREMENTS
Great communication skills - Listening carefully and asking the right questions is key to this role along with a good grasp on software functionality, features, and common requirements.

High energy - You are someone who's passionate and driven, full of energy, and ready to bring that to your job. You aim to hit your targets and profit from crushing it! Your positive attitude is inspiring and you help your team achieve great things.

Software knowledge - You know your way around a number of software solutions and have used different cloud products (like Google Sheets, etc). You know what user licenses and common software features are. Maybe you even have experience using project management software.

- 2+ years of marketing, operations or sales experience in B2B tech and/or startups
- A Bachelor's degree or above with a demonstrable interest in business, technology, statistics or analytics
- A keen understanding of the SaaS / software market and marketplaces in general
- Experience working with CRMs, planning and implementing sales and marketing strategies and dealing with B2B clients
- Experience working with large datasets (Excel, Google Sheets, etc)

OPPORTUNITY
Ideally, you will work with partners, software vendors, users, and technical colleagues to refine, test, tweak and scale this digital match-making machine. 

There is an immediate opportunity to take charge of this program and become the program manager for the right candidate. The managerial role sits at the intersection between marketing, sales, customer success, and product management.

That means that the program’s success is your success!

REWARD
We offer competitive salaries and direct, uncapped commissions based on your performance and successful matches. We also offer attractive stock options and pension benefits - all of which will scale with the impact you have on our business. Your base salary will depend on your level of experience and overall skillset.

Base: £25K – £35K
Bonus: depending on performance
Stock Options: Depending on exp. & performance

NEXT STEPS
Are you up for a challenge and ready to bring high energy to your job each day to qualify buyers? Then this is the right role for you!

Join us at Crozdesk and become part of our fast-paced, close-knit team in a flexible role with plenty of responsibilities and room for growth!

jobs.title: Content Marketing Intern (SaaS)
jobs.description:
***For immediate start - March 2020***

**About us**
Crozdesk.com runs software marketplaces and comparison sites helping businesses globally decide on which software solutions to use. From CRM to Accounting and Marketing Automation to Supply Chain Management - we cover 250+ categories of business software and compare almost everything for our users! Our vendor solutions portal helps thousands of software companies connect with their ideal customers.
We have a dynamic team that's distributed globally with our head office based in Shoreditch, London - which is where you will be located.
If you like a collaborative and productive environment in which responsibilities are shared and where you'll come in contact with all aspects of the business, you'll fit right in.

**The Internship**
We are looking for a content intern with an analytical mind, a hands-on attitude and a knack for details, to join us for a 3+ months internship. You’ll be part of a small startup team, work on data-driven SEO strategy and content marketing initiatives across a wide range of industries and Software-as-a-Service categories. You will get the chance to work with partners, freelancers, users and colleagues, to produce, edit and manage the content we publish through our software comparison sites. This will involve writing and editing content to help business software buyers world-wide in their search for software. We cover 250+ categories of software (e.g. CRMs, project management solutions, etc.) - so, technical acumen and analytical thinking/writing abilities are key.
The internship is best suited for well-rounded candidates who don’t mind a challenge, are looking to learn and be part of an environment where responsibilities are shared regardless of the job title.

**Requirements:**
* Previous work experience B2B tech, startups or demonstrable interest in all things tech
* A Bachelor's degree or above (in progress or completed), ideally focussed on business administration, humanities or scientific subjects
* An understanding of SaaS / business software and marketplaces in general
* Experience working with large datasets (Excel, Google Sheets, etc)
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Basic knowledge of SEO and web content production
* An entrepreneurial mindset and good technical acumen

**Internship Salary:** ~£1500 per month

Join us at Crozdesk and become part of our fast-paced, close-knit team in a flexible role with plenty of responsibilities and room for growth - either as a temporary learning opportunity or on your way to permanent employment! We look forward to your creative applications.
